004package mkt;
005
006import java.util.Arrays;
007import java.util.ArrayList;
008import java.util.function.Consumer;
009import kut.*;
010
011/** Market daily quote */
012public class Quotes {
013  /** Company nicks. */
014  public final String[] cos;
015  /** 'opens' and 'closes' dates (from before to after). */
016  public final String[] dates;
017  /** Matrix of opens. Rows: one for each date. Cols: one for each company. */
018  public final double[][] opens;
019  /** Matrix of closes. Rows: one for each date. Cols: one for each company. */
020  public final double[][] closes;
021  /** Matrix of maxima. Rows: one for each date. Cols: one for each company. */
022  public final double[][] maxs;
023  /** Matrix of minima. Rows: one for each date. Cols: one for each company. */
024  public final double[][] mins;
025
026  /**
027   * Constructor.
028   * @param cos Company nicks.
029   * @param dates 'opens' and 'closes' dates (from before to after).
030   * @param opens Matrix of closes.
031   *              Rows: one for each date. Cols: one for each company.
032   * @param closes Matrix of opens.
033   *              Rows: one for each date. Cols: one for each company.
034   * @param maxs Matrix of maxima.
035   *              Rows: one for each date. Cols: one for each company.
036   * @param mins Matrix of minima.
037   *              Rows: one for each date. Cols: one for each company.
038   */
039  public Quotes (
040    String[] cos, String[] dates,
041    double[][] opens, double [][] closes, double[][] maxs, double [][] mins
042  ) {
043    int ncos = cos.length;
044    assert (dates.length == Cts.historicQuotes);
045    assert (opens.length == Cts.historicQuotes);
046    assert (opens[0].length == ncos);
047    assert (closes.length == Cts.historicQuotes);
048    assert (closes[0].length == ncos);
049    assert (maxs.length == Cts.historicQuotes);
050    assert (maxs[0].length == ncos);
051    assert (mins.length == Cts.historicQuotes);
052    assert (mins[0].length == ncos);
053
054    this.cos = cos;
055    this.dates = dates;
056    this.opens = opens;
057    this.closes = closes;
058    this.maxs = maxs;
059    this.mins = mins;
060  }
061
062  /**
063  Returns JSON serialization.
064  @return Ditto.
065  */
066  public String toJs () {
067    return Js.w(Arr.mk(
068      Arr.toJs(Arr.mk(cos), Js::w),
069      Arr.toJs(Arr.mk(dates), Js::w),
070      Arr.toJs(Arr.mk(opens), (double[] os) -> Arr.toJs(Arr.mk(os), Js::w)),
071      Arr.toJs(Arr.mk(closes), (double[] os) -> Arr.toJs(Arr.mk(os), Js::w)),
072      Arr.toJs(Arr.mk(maxs), (double[] os) -> Arr.toJs(Arr.mk(os), Js::w)),
073      Arr.toJs(Arr.mk(mins), (double[] os) -> Arr.toJs(Arr.mk(os), Js::w))
074    ));
075  }
076
077  /**
078  Restores JSON serialization.
079  @param js JSON serialization.
080  @return Quotes.
081  */
082  public static Quotes fromJs (String js) {
083    ArrayList<String> a = Js.ra(js);
084    return new Quotes (
085      Arr.to(Arr.fromJs(a.get(0), Js::rs)),
086      Arr.to(Arr.fromJs(a.get(1), Js::rs)),
087      Arr.to(Arr.fromJs(a.get(2), (j) -> Arr.toDoubles(Arr.fromJs(j, Js::rn)))),
088      Arr.to(Arr.fromJs(a.get(3), (j) -> Arr.toDoubles(Arr.fromJs(j, Js::rn)))),
089      Arr.to(Arr.fromJs(a.get(4), (j) -> Arr.toDoubles(Arr.fromJs(j, Js::rn)))),
090      Arr.to(Arr.fromJs(a.get(5), (j) -> Arr.toDoubles(Arr.fromJs(j, Js::rn))))
091    );
092  }
093
094  // Read dates
095  static void readDates(String[] dates, String co, ArrayList<String> qs) {
096    for (int i = 0; i < qs.size(); ++i) {
097      String qdate = Str.left(qs.get(i), 8);
098      if (!Mth.isDigits(qdate))
099        throw new IllegalStateException(Str.fmt(
100          "'%s'. Bad date in %s", qdate, co
101        ));
102      dates[i] = qdate;
103    }
104  }
105
106  /**
107   * Read normalized quotes (without -1).
108   * @param path 'NICK'.tb quotes directory.
109   * @param cos Companies to read.
110   * @return Quotes of 'cos'.
111   */
112  public static Quotes read (String path, String[] cos) {
113    String[] dates = new String[Cts.historicQuotes];
114    double[][][] quotes = new double[4][Cts.historicQuotes][cos.length];
115
116    for (int ico = 0; ico < cos.length; ++ico) {
117      String co = cos[ico];
118      String fpath = Path.cat(path, co + ".tb");
119      ArrayList<String> qs = Str.splitTrim(File.read(fpath).trim(), "\n");
120      if (qs.size() != Cts.historicQuotes)
121        throw new IllegalStateException(Str.fmt(
122          "Dates of %s are different from %d", co, Cts.historicQuotes
123        ));
124      Arr.reverseIn(qs);
125
126      if (ico == 0) readDates(dates, co, qs);
127
128      for (int idate = 0; idate < Cts.historicQuotes; ++idate) {
129        ArrayList<String> es = Str.splitTrim(qs.get(idate), ":");
130        if (es.size() != 7)
131          throw new IllegalStateException(Str.fmt(
132            "Quote %s of %s has not 7 fields.", qs.get(idate), co
133          ));
134
135        for (int ie = 0; ie < 4; ++ie) {
136          String q = es.get(ie + 1);
137          Opt<Double> nOp = Mth.stod(q);
138          if (nOp.isNone())
139            throw new IllegalStateException(Str.fmt(
140              "Bad quote %s in %s of %s.", q, qs.get(idate), co
141            ));
142          double n = nOp.getValue();
143
144          if (n < 0 && idate > 0) {
145            if (quotes[ie][idate - 1][ico] >= 0)
146              quotes[ie][idate][ico] = quotes[ie][idate - 1][ico];
147            else
148              quotes[ie][idate][ico] = -1;
149          } else {
150            if (idate > 0 && quotes[ie][idate - 1][ico] < 0) {
151              for (int i = idate; i >= 0; --i)
152                quotes[ie][i][ico] = n;
153            } else {
154              quotes[ie][idate][ico] = n;
155            }
156          }
157        }
158      }
159    }
160    return new Quotes(cos, dates, quotes[0], quotes[1], quotes[2], quotes[3]);
161  }
162
163  /**
164   * Retuns a Quotes with only one company
165   * @param qs Quotes to extract the company.
166   * @param coIx Index of company in 'qs.cos'.
167   * @return Ditto.
168   */
169  public static Quotes getSingle (Quotes qs, int coIx) {
170    String[] cos = new String[]{qs.cos[coIx]};
171    int ndates = qs.dates.length;
172    double[][] os = new double[ndates][1];
173    double[][] cs = new double[ndates][1];
174    double[][] mx = new double[ndates][1];
175    double[][] mn = new double[ndates][1];
176
177    double[][] opens = qs.opens;
178    double[][] closes = qs.closes;
179    double[][] maxs = qs.maxs;
180    double[][] mins = qs.mins;
181    for (int i = 0; i < ndates; ++i) {
182      os[i][0] = opens[i][coIx];
183      cs[i][0] = closes[i][coIx];
184      mx[i][0] = mins[i][coIx];
185      mn[i][0] = maxs[i][coIx];
186    }
187
188    return new Quotes(cos, qs.dates, os, cs, mx, mn);
189  }
190
191}
